about_the_game:
Euryale is a long-lived succubus that has spent centuries seducing humans for their delicious lust energy. During one-such seduction, a meteor from an unknown origin crashes releasing a strange new energy that fills Euryale and grants her a vision of the future with the command: "save her". Confused by the vision, Euryale follows the meteor and meets Elena, a beautiful human. The two fall in love and Euryale concludes that she must be the one in the vision who she is supposed to save. She translates the vision and decides in order to save Elena, she must travel back to the 19th century and help a man named Spoons to stop a war.

After travelling back in time, Euryale finds herself up against the Succubus Queen Igret who is pulling the strings of war as she has for centuries. The Queen reveals to Euryale a hidden truth about her past that forces her to reconsider everything she thought about herself.

Join the journey as Euryale both uncovers the truth about her past while trying to save Elena and the future.

Euryale's Gambit takes place in a world different than the historic 19th century you were taught in school. In this world, supernatural entities exist including gods, angels, demons and succubi from several different mythologies including and primarily Greek (but with a very unique spin). Euryale will encounter many foes as she carries out Spoon's plan. She will have to use her unique talents and succubus skills to overcome her enemies and achieve her objective.

Gameplay


EG is a linear-style visual novel with choices that affect different scenes as well as Euryale's relationships with others. Depending on choices, there are several "bad endings" which will prevent continuation of the story. However, for the full experience, it's recommended to try to get all the bad endings.

Features (as of version 1.0)


  • AI (via free DLC) and human voice acting
  • AI animated 3D images
  • Environmental effects/animations

Content


  • 3000+ 3DCG Images
  • 150+ Animations
  • 80%+ Voiced (AI and Human)
  • 200+ mins of gameplay

Content Types (Flavors)


  • Monster Girls
  • Harem (Reverse Harem)
  • Oral Sex
  • Face-sitting
  • Group
  • Squirting
  • Light Femdom
  • Lesbian
  • Lesbian-only route (optional)
  • Masturbation
  • Voyeurism

  • Incest
  • Power Exchange

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes with graphic violence, gore, explicit sexual interactions, nudity, non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol use.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel gen9 or later
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit sound card or better

name: Euryale's Gambit

Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit sound card or better

short_description: Euryale's Gambit (EG) is the story of a succubus who goes back in time to the 19th century United States in order to save the future from a dark fate. EG is a linear-style Visual Novel with content based on relationship building and several "bad endings" that you don't want to miss.
